title: Fairness Evaluation and Bias Mitigation in Machine Learning-Based Lending Systems
description: A research-oriented framework for evaluating algorithmic fairness in machine learning-based lending systems. The project systematically compares multiple classifiers, fairness metrics, and bias mitigation techniques to analyze trade-offs between predictive performance and fairness objectives in financial decision-making.

creators.name: Daakshayani N S
creators.affiliation: Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India

notes: This project was developed as part of a research investigation into fairness, accountability, and transparency in machine learning systems applied to financial decision-making.
